column2: A powerful weapon to be used agaisnt the undead, though it's twisted malevolence torments its wielder with visions of impending undeath.
Forged by Malach the Cruel, this sword easily dispatches the undead not that the living shouldn't fear it too.
The Shield of Ptolos is magically inscribed with a myriad of distracting patterns and designs that magically send arrows and bolts spinning off course.
